Source code is on [http://github.com/bagilevi/android-pedometer GitHub]

To make your own version fork [http://github.com/bagilevi/android-pedometer the project on GitHub]

To get a local copy install git and clone the project like this:

{{{
git clone git://github.com/bagilevi/android-pedometer.git
}}}

or [https://github.com/bagilevi/android-pedometer/zipball/master download .zip] or [https://github.com/bagilevi/android-pedometer/tarball/master download .tar.gz]
